title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1025.23 - ORM-D
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1025.23 - ORM-D
State Regulations

Materials listed under this class are allowed passage, provided that they are in compliance with all Federal regulations related to
unit containers and outside packaging, but shall not exceed 4,000 pounds gross
weight in any one vehicle. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1025.23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
